text: Thanks, Melissa and Justin!

From Anne: Justin and I are going to plan to be around Tuesday and part of Wednesday the week of the 20th (so the 21st and 22nd). Justin may get in earlier on Monday and be around for half the day on the 20th as well.

Let's chat about Micah and Michaela's involvement that week - I think both would be important but am wondering if we want either down in Portland or should just have them call in.
I went ahead and told them that we could decide this week, but if they needed to book it, to plan on joining us. More collaboration = better. :simple_smile:
so - I think any thing CAN work, but if they're important, they should be here
its really difficult to collaborate over the phone
What's the agenda for next week's meetings? Any lunches or dinners planned?
honestly I havent even thought about it - I think we'll have a better sense of that after today
cool. That's something we can highlight when the group is here next week. Who's coming next week? Anne and Justin?
I would like Anne + Justin as well as Micah and Michaela
if their input is important - they should be here
<@U0260V4K1> / <@U0265G76F> just emailed you the deck for today's call
shall I send to the client or should we go over this in real time and then send it to them after the meeting?
we could also send it right at the start of the meeting
I think the ideal is to use a google hangout and show it to them then
<@U02688JHZ>: are we too late to set this up with them?
if so, I'd say the second best option is to send them the deck right before our call and then just walk them through it
i would vote skype over hangout
based on our experiences interviewing intern candidates
skype was WAY more reliable
can we screen share over skype?
yes
in that case I have two questions: 1) would you mind hosting the skype call on your machine and 2) would you be able to ping justin or anne and set it up?
yes and yes
one other thing: can we move the k7 tentpole to opportunities?
the more I think about - the more I think it belongs there
ok
it can be anywhere before "Right place right time"
sorry about the last second change
shall we do this in echo?
think so
we're wrapping a meeting, but will be in shortly
np
